entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:59 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:59 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 24.
